text: Vuga uti:- nimusabe kw’izina ry’Imana canke musabe kw’izina rya nyene imigisha canke kw’izina iryariryo ryose muyi hamagarira ko, kuko ifise amazina meza meza, kandi ntusome iyi Qur’ani kw’ijwi rininiya, canke ntuyisome kw’ijwi rigufiya, nawe uri muma sengesho yawe mu vy’ukuri ahubwo nufate inzira iri hagati y’izo
